price: Diles: "Yo adoro solamente a Dios, y Le rindo culto sincero.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
